string.name: name
string.value: Before Receiving the Secret Organization's Third Mission
#p1013202#, from the Secret Organization, starts talking to you.

#p1013202# thanks you for the good job you've done so far and asks you to come to the #b#m922030000##k in #b#m220000300##k if you want to know more about the Secret Organization. He says that he will meet you there in person to tell you more...

#p1013202#'s name is #p1013203#. He says that the name of the Organization that he is in is called the Black Wings and that they are trying to awaken a great being called the Black Mage in order to make Maple World a better place to live. They are currently in the process of preparing for that event...
Welcome, Evan. I think this is our first meeting face to face. I am a Black Wings Captain, and my name is #p1013203#. Nice to meet you. \r\n#L0##bWhat? The Black Wings?#l\n#k

Yes. That is the name of the organization you and I serve. It is, as you know, a secret organization, which is why we have the word Black in it.\r\n#L0##bWhat is the mission of the Black Wings, exactly?#l\n#k

The Black Wings are here to help make Maple World a better place for everyone. We do a variety of things to help out. \r\n#L0##bYou mean like making Growth Stimulators for crops and killing Zombies?#l\n#k
Sure, sure. Things like that, but we have much greater things in store. For the future of Maple World, we are doing everything we can to resurrect the great Black Mage.\r\n#L0##bThe Black Mage?#l\n#k

Precisely. I can't provide more details until you reach a higher rank within the organization. But I will say this. This organization was specifically formed to resurrect the Black Mage. Bringing the Black Mage back is the best thing that could ever happen to Maple World.
I hope that satisfies your curiosity. Alright then. I am now ready to give you your next mission.
